ðŸ“– Summary: Glicol is a graph-oriented live coding language and audio DSP library written in Rust, designed for creating music and audio applications. It offers a synth-like syntax and real-time audio synthesis capabilities, and can be used for live coding, education, and audio app development on platforms like browsers, VST plugins, and Bela boards.
